channel.title: I begg pay attention please! [ i cannot connect client t soruce]
channel.description:
HELLO PLEASE SOME ONE HELP ME IM SO HAPPY 1ST TIME IM SO FAR WITH MAKEING A SERVER!
i opened port [portforwared]
no ip duc done now i need only to client to source kinda i need a coder or something can some one please help me with my problems?!?! i cannot make a client connect to a source!!!

item.title: I begg pay attention please! [ i cannot connect client t soruce]
item.dc:creator: @BentonScape BentonScape
item.description:
@BentonScape wrote:

_You May Need To Go Into Your Client Files And Search For “Client.Java” Then Open It Up.
_Once You Opened It Up Search For Either “127.0.0.1” Or “0.0.0.0” Or What Ever The Original Server IP Was.
_Next Replace It With Your New “No-Ip.Org” Server IP.
_Once You Have Done This Compiler Your Client Files Then Re-Run Both The Server And Client And Boom!

_Your All Done, Hope I Helped You Out, Good Luck With Your Server.

Read full topic
item.source: I begg pay attention please! [ i cannot connect client t soruce]
